CustomField.description: Field to be used in Email Templates based on Store
CustomField.formula: CASE(Choice_of_store_Name__c, "Supermagasins 01", "gatineau@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 03", "brossard@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 04", "lavalest@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 06", "pointeclaire@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 07", "boucherville@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 08", "mascouche@trevi.ca", "Supermagasins 09", "blainville@trevi.ca", "" /* Remplacez par une valeur par d√©faut si aucun magasin ne correspond */ )
CustomField.label: Signature Email
